DESCRIPTION: The Reserve Bank had prescribed a set of baseline cyber security controls for primary (Urban) cooperative banks (UCBs) in October 2018. On further examination, it has been decided to prescribe a comprehensive cyber security framework for the UCBs, as a graded approach, based on their digital depth and interconnectedness with the payment systems landscape, digital products offered by them and assessment of cyber security risk. The framework would mandate implementation of progressively stronger security measures based on the nature, variety and scale of digital product offerings of banks.
REQUIREMENTS_DESCRIPTION: Implement appropriate (e.g. centralised) systems and controls to allow, manage, log and monitor privileged/super user/administrative access to critical systems (servers/databases, applications, network devices etc.)
STATUSEXTENDED: No CloudTrail trails enabled with logging were found.
NAME: Reserve Bank of India (RBI) Cyber Security Framework

REQUIREMENTS_DESCRIPTION: UCBs should maintain an up-to-date business IT Asset Inventory Register containing the following fields, as a minimum: a) Details of the IT Asset (viz., hardware/software/network devices, key personnel, services, etc.), b. On further examination, it has been decided to prescribe a comprehensive cyber security framework for the UCBs, as a graded approach, based on their digital depth and interconnectedness with the payment systems landscape, digital products offered by them and assessment of cyber security risk. The framework would mandate implementation of progressively stronger security measures based on the nature, variety and scale of digital product offerings of banks.
REQUIREMENTS_DESCRIPTION: Disallow administrative rights on end-user workstations/PCs/laptops and provide access rights on a ‘need to know’ and ‘need to do’ basis.
STATUSEXTENDED: AWS policy CloudWatchFullAccess is attached but does not allow '*:*' administrative privileges.

REQUIREMENTS_DESCRIPTION: UCBs should maintain an up-to-date business IT Asset Inventory Register containing the following fields, as a minimum: a) Details of the IT Asset (viz., hardware/software/network devices, key personnel, services, etc.), b. REQUIREMENTS_DESCRIPTION: Appropriately manage and provide protection within and outside UCB/network, keeping in mind how the data/information is stored, transmitted, processed, accessed and put to use within/outside the UCB’s network, and level of risk they are exposed to depending on the sensitivity of the data/information.
STATUSEXTENDED: VPC subnet subnet-0251e24b17b5fc298 assigns public IP by default.
NAME: Reserve Bank of India (RBI) Cyber Security Framework
